name: Golden State Banana Split
author: Anonymous
summary: Whether you are celebrating a big day or indulging a craving, this big, classic banana split is a show stopping dessert. Three kinds of ice cream and all of your favorite sundae toppings sit on top of a split banana and are topped with whipped cream, almonds and juicy fresh raspberries.
ingredients: 1  ripe banana, split in half lengthwise
⅓ cup California Rocky Road ice cream
⅓ cup California vanilla ice cream
⅓ cup California strawberry ice cream
¼ cup chopped or sliced almonds
directions: Place ice cream scoops in a row
Top Rocky Road ice cream with chocolate sauce; top vanilla ice cream with caramel sauce; top strawberry ice cream with raspberry sauce
Garnish each scoop with a dollop of whipped cream, a sprinkling of almonds and a fresh raspberry
